Inside Macintosh: Apple Guide Complete / Part - Appendixes
Appendix D - Checklist

Building Your Guide File

Compile your source files into a guide file by performing these tasks:

  • Open Guide Maker (see page 4-3)
  • Compile your source files (see page 5-5)
  • Save your guide file (see page 5-6)
